## Pre-ValPar.CH...

![](media/evp3.jpg){fig-align="center"}

::: {.notes}
I thought I'd start with a little insight into how my days looked before I started a PhD because the difference is quite stark. For several years I managed an Ecotourism in the remote North-East of Cambodia which aimed to try and re-invent what an ethical model of an Elephant sanctuary could be. It existed on 1500 hectares of open forest land and the elephants roamed around so a good part of my day was spent get lost looking for them and occasionally not finding them which, as you can imagine led to some very unhappy visitors. 
:::
